entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@DrRPNishank @cbseindia29 @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive Respected Sir, 
Please postpone NEET and JEE exam also as lakhs of students participate all over India. 
During this pandemic it's not safe to give exams as cases of COVID19 is rising everyday. In Maharashtra situations are not good. Please think about it Sir. 
#HealthOverExams
